適應症: 下列症狀之緩和：痔出血、肛門周圍炎、裂痔、切痔、肛門搔癢
主成分略述: EPHEDRINE HCL (EQ TO EPHEDRINE HYDROCHLORIDE), HYDROCORTISONE ACETATE, PROCAINE HCL, BENZOCAINE (ETHYL AMINOBENZOATE), CHLOROPHYLL SODIUM COPPER, ZINC OXIDE
